problem_text_cn: 如图,点P是直线l外一个定点,点A为直线l上一个定点,点P关于直线l的对称点记为P~1~,将直线l绕点A顺时针旋转30°得到直线l′,此时点P~2~与点P关于直线l′对称,则∠P~1~AP~2~等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a fixed point outside the line l, point A is a fixed point on the line l, the symmetry point of the point P with respect to the line l is recorded as P~N_0~, and the line l is rotated clockwise around the point A by N_1 to obtain the line l′ , At this time point P~N_2~and point P are symmetric with respect to the straight line l′, then ∠P~N_3~AP~N_4~ is equal to ()
